Name: Superpantsu Harematchii
About the game: A naughty single player deck builder rogue-like with match-3 puzzle mechanics. Collect cards to make your deck stronger and coins to buy potions and unlock new cards while working your way through matches against cute monsters and anime girls. Use the match-3 puzzle mechanic to collect mana/energy to play cards from your hand. Beware, your opponent is also collecting tiles in their turn and could be grabbing that colour match you were waiting for. Reach the end of a run to unlock the gallery of that character and play with her using your “special” cards.
